channel.title: RSC Help
channel.description: Well, i own RSCDesirePK, and i haven't released yet because i need help :( i don't know how to portforward it... and if someone teaches me how or does it for me i would give them a staff spot on the server. PLEASE HELP

item.title: RSC Help
item.dc:creator: @uberpk3r uberpk3r
item.description:
@uberpk3r wrote:

Wow 80% really don’t know how to port forward. My self I find it quite easy.
First rule is that You CAN’T use the same IP in the client that other people users(not you with other words)
Therefor if you host a server on your own computer you have to use localhost or something for yourself and your(www.whatismyip.com) ip

The funny thing is I never owned a router I always use a cable, I learned this by helping members(exploring).

Read full topic
